definition: earth/dust/clay/local/indigenous/crude opium/unsophisticated/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
to make known/to show/to prove/to write/book/outstanding

sentences.english: Unless you are a native Indian, everyone emigrated from somewhere.
sentences.chinese: 除非你是印度土著，不然人都是各处移民的。

sentences.english: The natives use poisoned arrows to kill big game.
sentences.chinese: 土著用毒箭射杀大猎物。

sentences.english: The colonists massacred thousands of natives with brutal and callous force.
sentences.chinese: 殖民者惨绝人寰地屠杀了成千的土著居民。

sentences.english: I took a course on Native American history and culture in college.
sentences.chinese: 上大学时，我选过一门美洲土著历史和文化的课程。

sentences.english: People with indigenous belief systems don't have to bother deconstructing anything.
sentences.chinese: 而持有土著民族信仰体系的人们则无需担心解构什么。

sentences.english: Some people say it came from the Native American Indiantrivetribe known as the Choctaw.
sentences.chinese: 一些人说这是来自于美国当地土著人的乔克托语。

sentences.english: The visitor can ponder over the boomerangs used by aborigines at the time of Cook.
sentences.chinese: 来访者可以琢磨琢磨土著人在库克时期用的回飞镖。

sentences.english: Wells hopes future conservation of these animals will fully involve aboriginal cultures.
sentences.chinese: 威尔斯希望这些动物的保育将来会涵括所有土著文化。

sentences.english: Where application would abrogate rights guaranteed by Native American treaties.
sentences.chinese: 或者适用将取消土著居民条约上保证的权利。

sentences.english: Mr Moore said there were particularly great job opportunities for Aborigines who joined in the project.
sentences.chinese: 摩尔称，这一活动能为土著居民提供大量的工作机会。

sentences.english: Uluru is a centre of Aborighinal culture.
sentences.chinese: 乌卢鲁是土著文化的中心。

sentences.english: Around A. D. 600, the Mayas were the main aboriginal group in Central America.
sentences.chinese: 公元600年左右，玛雅人是中美洲主要的土著居民。

sentences.english: Native Americans who lived near the Great Lakes often fished by torchlight.
sentences.chinese: 居住在“五大湖”附近的土著人经常使用火把捕鱼。

sentences.english: Han Taiwanese as well as indigenous filmgoers don aboriginal dress for the viewing.
sentences.chinese: 为了装点风景台湾汉族影迷们也穿上土著居民的服饰。

sentences.english: Aborigines kick up dust in a dance at sunset.
sentences.chinese: 土著居民日落时的舞蹈能把灰尘扬起来。

sentences.english: Aborigines number 410,000, and the government is making efforts to settle aboriginal land rights.
sentences.chinese: 这里有41万土著，政府正在尽力保护土著的权利。
